title: If you are a lot higher ELO than your opponent, don't be an asshole
body:
If you are platnium, diamond, etc... and somehow are matched against and then crush an unranked, fresh to league, player (or someone significantly lower ELO than your's), do not be an asshole about how easy it was for you to beat them. No one is impressed with you or your performance. You had basically a free lane and likely a free win. You don't have to boast in all chat who the better X (lane/role) is, because it obviously was you. You are high ELO, they may have never played against your champion before, or just haven't gotten the hang of everything quite yet. Point is, no one really cares how good you are and you carrying on about it just makes you look like an asshole.

If you feel the need to talk to your opponent, maybe give them some advice (productive/helpful advice, not "uninstall" or "get good").

I once had an ARAM game, including myself, an unknown, a Bronze player, a Gold player and a Challenger player.

Around early to mid-game, the Gold started talking trash to the Bronze player, about how he was useless, did everything wrong, and behaved pretty much like the proverbial asshole described in this thread.

After a short while of continuous thrash-talking, the Challenger stepped in and pretty much picked the Gold player apart.
He (politely!) pointed out all the things the Gold player did wrong, how _he_ could improve, and the Challenger went through most of the list that the Gold player had picked on the Bronze player for, finding flaws with ALL of it.

The Gold player didn't say another word for the rest of the game.

As for myself, I wasn't really capable of playing at all through all this, as I was just sitting here, laughing and applauding the Challenger for what he did, and especially _how_ he did it. 
No flaming, passive aggression or direct offending; just short, factual sentences on how things should be done. I learned quite a lot from it myself.
_I was also rather stunned at how the Challenger spoke at all - they usually just dominate in complete silence._
